name: Overworld (Aayush, YaySushi)
description:
Overworld is an RPG created for GDJam 21.

Attempt to save the princess by slaying the dragon in a giant world filled with monsters and loot.

You play as a sprite exploring the map finding treasure, food, and enemies. You have a limited number of moves before you must rest. But beware, resting too much too soon gets you trapped.

WASD - move player

I - show inventory

P - Camp (this uses resources and gives its benefits)

walk into enemies and items in the game to interact with them.
